title: 2017《哈 臺南》第十一集：HOT英語教室 │《Hot Tainan》EP11  Hot English Classroom

json.text: Hello, I'm Ivan. 哈囉，我是Ivan.
Hello, I'm Harold. 哈囉，我是Harold.
Welcome to Hot English Classroom‭!‬ 歡迎來到哈英語教室
Harold‭, ‬do‭ ‬you enjoy watching the sunset‭?‬ Harold，你喜歡看夕陽嗎？
Of course I do‭! ‬I’ve heard that Jingzaijiao  當然囉！聽說臺南最有名的
is the best place to watch the sunset in Tainan‭.‬ 觀夕景點就是井仔腳
That’s right. It’s a very popular spot. Have you been to Beimen?  哇！沒錯！這裡是熱門景點。你來過北門嗎？
No, I haven’t. Where is Beimen, anyway?  沒有，北門在哪裡？
Jingzaijiao is right in Beimen.  井仔腳就在北門
Salt was once extensively produced there.  那裡曾經是盛產鹽的地方
Are there any spots that you will recommend?  有推薦的景點嗎？
Sure! If you are interested in history, 當然有啊！你如果對歷史感興趣，
the Beimen Salt Administration Office  一定不能錯過北門出張所
and the Beimen Salt-Washing Plant are places you shouldn’t miss. 和北門洗滌鹽工廠
You will have a better understanding  去那裡可以認識
of the history of salt in Beimen. 北門「鹽」的故事
That sounds Wonderful! Are they far away from each other? 哇！太好了，這兩個點的距離很遠嗎？
Not at all‭. ‬They are both within easy‭ ‬walking distance  不會喔！都在北門遊客中心附近，
of the Beimen Visitor Center‭.‬ 散步就能到了！
I can’t miss that then‭! ‬ 那我絕對不能錯過！
Do you have any recommendations for eating food in Beimen? 那麼，還有推薦的美食嗎？
Absolutely‭. ‬ 當然有囉！
The salt-based dishes are really worth a try. 來到北門一定要品嚐在地的鹽鄉料理
Like what? 例如呢？
Like milkfish, salted grilled fish,  虱目魚  一夜干
milkfish sausages, and of course, the fresh local seafood. 虱目魚香腸 當然也不能錯過在地的海鮮
I guess the seafood there must be really fresh and delicious. 這倒是，那裡的海鮮一定非常鮮甜
Yep‭. ‬Besides‭, ‬you also get to try Beimen’s exclusive salted coffee  沒錯！另外，北門出張所裡面還可以
inside the Beimen Salt Administration Office. 喝到北門限定的鹽味咖啡
Salt added to coffee‭?‬ 連咖啡都加鹽
Exactly‭. ‬The taste is quite unique‭.‬ 沒錯，口味非常特別喔！
Oh‭, ‬I’ve also heard that the tofu pudding  喔！我聽說北門的
in Beimen is pretty famous. Is that true? 豆花也很有名？真的嗎？
You bet! And by the way, the Hong Tong Painting Village  當然是真的！喔！對了，你還可以去洪通彩繪村
and the Nankunshen Daitian Temple are also worth a visit. 和南鯤鯓代天府走走
Wow‭, ‬I don’t think I could remember all that‭!‬ 哇！這麼多地方，我一定記不起來！
Ha‭, ‬that’s why you have to stay tuned to Hot Tainan‭!‬ 哈哈‭ 那一定要鎖定我們哈臺南囉！
Let’s review the new words for‭ ‬today‭.‬ 讓我們一起複習今天的單字
Let’s review‭!‬ 一起來複習吧！
Beimen 北門‭ ‬
sunset viewing spot 觀夕景點‭ ‬
salt village 鹽鄉‭ ‬
wash 洗滌‭ ‬
salt production plant 鹽工廠‭ ‬
distance 距離‭ ‬
exclusive 限定‭ ‬
tofu pudding 豆花‭ ‬
stay tuned 鎖定‭ ‬
Did you remember all that‭?‬ 都記起來了嗎？
I‭ ‬got it‭.‬ 我都記起來了
See you next time on Hot English Classroom‭!‬ 英語小教室，下次見囉！
